contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox person | name = Ian Jones-Quartey | image = | birth_place = [[United States|U.S.]] | occupation = [[Storyboard Artist]], [[Animator]], [[Voice Actor]] | years_active = ????â€“present | website = }} '''Ian Jones-Quartey''' is a storyboard artist, animator and voice actor who supplies the voice of Wallow in ''[[Bravest Warriors]]'' and is creative director of the upcoming [[Cartoon Network]] series ''[[Steven Universe]]''. He also is the creator of ''Lakewood Plaza Turbo'', the pilot has been pitched to [[Cartoon Network Studios]], now it's becoming a full series. He was also a crew member for ''[[Adventure Time]]'' and ''[[The Venture Bros.]]''. ==Trivia== *Ian is the co-creator of the web series "nockFORCE." *He is the creator for the web-comic series "[[RPG World]]." *He was also a founding member of the now defunct "bagofchips" group, a collective of web cartoonists set up in opposition to sites like "Keenspot" and ''"Blank Label Comics"'', and ''RPG World'' was a key feature in this network. Other members included Aaron Farber, Meredith Gran, Josh Mirman, and David McGuire, all of whom soon abandoned their own related projects. *Ian is also a former storyboard revisionist/supervisor on the television show ''[http://adventuretime.wikia.com/wiki/Adventure_Time_with_Finn_and_Jake_Wiki Adventure Time]''. [[Category:Living people]] {{film-bio-stub}}
